applications.description: You will be part of the core team developing scalable cloud services for our global user base. The role involves coding, system design, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
applications.notes: Completed technical interview. Waiting for response.

applications.description: Develop user-facing features for our e-commerce platform using React.js. You will work closely with designers to create high-performing web applications.
Build and maintain server-side logic, database schemas, and APIs for a cloud-based service. You'll be involved in scaling and optimizing our backend infrastructure.
Analyze user data and develop machine learning models to improve user engagement and personalization. You'll collaborate with product teams to translate data insights into business strategies.
applications.notes: Received feedback after final round interview. Position filled.

applications.description: Contribute to building our next-gen mobile app on iOS and Android. You'll work on creating innovative features to enhance the streaming experience for millions of users.
Manage cloud infrastructure and improve CI/CD pipelines for our streaming platform. You will ensure system reliability, automate deployments, and monitor cloud performance.
Work on developing and maintaining both front-end and back-end systems for Tesla’s internal tools. Your work will help streamline the production and delivery of vehicles.
applications.notes: Technical interview completed, awaiting next steps.

applications.description: Lead product development for Uber’s mobility team, focusing on user engagement and new feature rollouts. You will work with engineers and designers to define the product vision.
Design, plan, and manage scalable cloud solutions for Salesforce’s enterprise customers. This role involves high-level architecture design and collaborating with development teams.
Ensure the security and integrity of Stripe’s payment systems. You will be responsible for designing security protocols and responding to potential threats.
applications.notes: First round interview completed, awaiting feedback.
